alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:20PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Otero, southeastern Sierra, northeastern Luna and northern Dona Ana Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 718 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Northrup Landing to 12 miles north of Jornada Range to 8 miles southwest of Hatch. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. Winds along a boundary will be the main concern along with areas of blowing dust reducing visibilities to around 3 miles. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hatch, Upham, Leasburg, Rincon, Northrup Landing, White Sands National Monument, Jornada Range, Radium Springs, Dona Ana, Salem, Garfield, Organ, Holloman Air Force Base, East Mesa, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range, Picacho, Uvas Valley and Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 7 and 50. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 153 and 163, between mile markers 177 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
